ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Tambourine
ygData.msgSnippet: Yah, two DT s would be bad, 3 would be death since I m a scrawny wood elf bard and only have 840 hp s with equip.  Maybe I can bum a talisman off someone just
ygData.messageBody:
Yah, two DT's would be bad, 3 would be death since I'm a scrawny wood elf
bard and only have 840 hp's with equip. Maybe I can bum a talisman off
someone just to be safe. Thanks for the info!

Kit

-----Original Message-----
From: Windleaf Mistsong [mailto:windleaf@...]
Sent: Friday, January 12, 2001 3:33 PM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Tambourine


They probable DT for about 300 points max. I did take 2 DT's as a 35 bard
and since we have such wimpy hit points, couldn't have been more than that.

I do highly recommend you get a SoW to pull one out of the canyon, even
before our drums were broken.

---Windleaf

At 03:24 PM 1/12/01 -0700, you wrote:
>Ummm, I think both of those would likely HT me for far more that a bub or 2
>at 35th??? Wouldn't they? Heck I don't know, if that's all HT does at
that
>level it is hardly fearsome in an outdoor situation.
>
> Kit
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: Cyr, Thierry [mailto:thierry.cyr@...]

>Subject: RE: [eqbards] Tambourine

>probably for about a bub or 2 of health... Just think of how the king HT's

>
>-Minkin

me

>
> Kit
